scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist/public && cp src/public/* dist/public && cp src/views/scripts/*.js dist/public && cp src/views/styles/*.css dist/public && cp src/views/*.html dist/public && cp node_modules/tabulator-tables/dist/css/tabulator.min.css dist/public && cp node_modules/tabulator-tables/dist/js/tabulator.min.js dist/public&& cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.umd.js dist/public
